description: Defines React components for rendering the game board of a word guessing game, including individual tiles and the overall game board grid, with handling of previous guesses, feedbacks, and current input.

methods.name: Tile({ letter, state })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a single tile with appropriate styling based on provided letter and state.

methods.name: GameBoard({ wordLength, maxAttempts, feedbacks, guesses, current, status })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders the entire game board grid, including past guesses with feedback, the current guess input row, and empty rows.

ctags.name: GameBoard
ctags.pattern: /^function GameBoard({ wordLength, maxAttempts, feedbacks, guesses, current, status }) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ wordLength, maxAttempts, feedbacks, guesses, current, status })
